\documentclass[
    tikz,
    margin=.5cm,
    convert={outext=.svg,command=\unexpanded{pdf2svg \infile\space\outfile}},
    multi=false
]{standalone}

\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont[
   Extension=.ttf,
   Path={fonts/},
]{Oswald-Regular}

\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{BlueLagoon}{HTML}{075471}
\definecolor{BondiBlue}{HTML}{0B91AB}
\definecolor{DavyGray}{HTML}{5C5858}
\definecolor{GoldenTainoi}{HTML}{FFC045}

\usepackage{ifthen}
\newboolean{favicon}
\setboolean{favicon}{true}

\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}
    \fill[GoldenTainoi!50] (0, -0.45) -- (-1, 0.55) -- (4, 5.55) -- (5, 4.55) -- cycle;
    \fill[GoldenTainoi] (0, 0) -- (-1, 1) -- (4, 6) -- (5, 5) -- cycle;
    \fill[BondiBlue!50] (-1.5, 1.05) -- (-2.5, 2.05) -- (2.5, 7.05) -- (3.5, 6.05) -- cycle;
    \fill[BondiBlue] (-1.5, 1.5) -- (-2.5, 2.5) -- (2.5, 7.5) -- (3.5, 6.5) -- cycle;
    \fill[BlueLagoon!50] (-3, 2.55) -- (-4, 3.55) -- (1, 8.55) -- (2, 7.55) -- cycle;
    \fill[BlueLagoon] (-3, 3) -- (-4, 4) -- (1, 9) -- (2, 8) -- cycle;
    \ifthenelse{\boolean{favicon}}{}{
        \node[right] at (6.5, 3.975) {\scalebox{13}{\textcolor{DavyGray}{COBYQA}}};
    }
\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
